page.title: 13Fashion
page.content:
The{"Breakdancing"}fashion has well and truly hit this area, so there is no question of the rural areas of the country missing out on the latest trends. Television ensures that the more remote parts of the country are kept right up to date with what is going on in the world.
Children dress in grey or green canvas trousers which are elasticated at the bottoms and have a multitude of unnecessary zips and patch pockets all over them. They wear colourful sweaters and many are able to do {"robotics"}as well as more active forms of dancing with incredible skill. Whereas a few months ago boys would have been ridiculed for dancing, today they win the respect of their peers if they are "ace breakers".
